entry.content:
Description

Outline for the talk is as follows: - Introduction - Explaining the background of the project and why visibility is important - Showcasing of both the repository and the bot - Explanaining of the bot’s architecture and set-up - Providing a forward-looking perspective (upcoming features and future developments)

I hope that the talk will inspire more PyLadies’ to share material publicly and to make the public perception of experts in the field more diverse.
